partintro.para: This part of the book sumarises the organsiation of the &vwg;.
The &hepix; is an organsiation and gathering of large predominatly High Energy Physics site administrators with the objective of sharing information and benifiting from each others experiances.

The &vwg; was set up by &hepix; to investigate the implications usecases and requirements of sites that where at the time expected to come from the relativly new technology of &vm; techechnology. The group is charied by Tony Cass and has met regularly and maintains a mailing list hepix-virtualisation@cern.ch where the majority of the content of theis document is extracted from.
